messages.message: @Liam Callanan i assume this is because of some `react-query` cached query being invalidated? i remember that you mentioned something similar previously?

I think we were talking about 2 issues: one is how the GT pages have refetches more often than necessary b/c of `refetchOnMount` and the other cache invalidation triggering a large refresh (which happens even w/ the default react query cache invalidation time).
I don’t think this is a `refetchOnMount` issue but I’ll double check. We should just need to update the invalidation time.
